channel.title: Webs.com Help!
channel.description: ok, i am using webs.com and i have a question. How do we add a new rank/permission. Atm there is moderator, admin etc but i want to add one that says Server Support. Is this possible? If so how?

item.title: Webs.com Help!
item.dc:creator: @CoderJessee CoderJessee
item.description:
@CoderJessee wrote:

[quote=“Host Gushers, post:5, topic:478993”][quote author=runescape sucks link=topic=597210.msg4205582#msg4205582 date=1358890689]
I made a website and checked it out, doesn’t seem like there’s anything. Protip: Change to a better forum software, webs is probably the worst in terms of private servers.
[/quote]
What do u suggest then?[/quote]
I suggest using a (free) webhost, and install a forum on it. This can either be SMF, MyBB, etc. Just Google it, there are plenty of tutorials out there.

Try 000Webhost.

Read full topic
